member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model
member.summary:
The Model class is the main entry point into the XHQ model (enterprise) server API infrastructure.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.LOG_READ
member.summary: API Logging category: read (get) values from XHQ model server

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.LOG_WRITE
member.summary: API Logging category: write (put) values to XHQ model server

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.LOG_ALL
member.summary: API Logging category: all

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.#ctor(com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model)
member.summary: Copy Constructor. Copies non connection-oriented settings.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getConnection(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a shared instance of this class for interfacing with the XHQ Model Server on the specified model server host. The application is responsible for managing the life cycle of this connection. However, when no references to the shared instance are present, the connection may be closed.
member.param: the host on which the model server is running
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getPrivateConnection(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a non-shared instance of this class for interfacing with the XHQ Model Server on the specified model server host. The caller is responsible for managing the life cycle of this connection.
member.param: the host on which the model server is running
member.returns: a connection to the XHQ Model Server
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getPrivateConnection(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a non-shared instance of this class for interfacing with the XHQ Model Server on the specified model server host. The caller is responsible for managing the life cycle of this connection.
member.param: the host on which the model server is running
member.returns: a connection to the XHQ Model Server
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.disconnect
member.summary: Disconnect from the XHQ Model Server. Any subsequent API calls fail. Any asynchronous updates are stopped.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getModelHost
member.summary: Returns the hostname that was used to connect to the model server. If disconnect has been called, null is returned instead.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getModelTimeZone
member.summary:
Returns current time zone being used for the model server host.
Since: XHQ 4.1
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getModelUser
member.summary: Returns account information associated with the connection.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getSecurityEnabled
member.summary: Query model server to see if security is enabled.
member.returns: true, if security is enabled, false otherwise
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.setLogger(java.util.logging.Logger)
member.summary: Instruct API to use a specific logger to handle log messages.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.setLogLevel(java.util.logging.Level)
member.summary: Set the general logging level of API calls.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.enableLoggingCategory(System.Int32)
member.summary: Enable logging of API calls in a specific category.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.disableLoggingCategory(System.Int32)
member.summary: Disable logging of API calls in a specific category.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getLogLevel
member.summary: Get the general logging level of API calls.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.log(java.util.logging.Level,System.String)
member.summary: Log a message via API logging infrastructure.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.log(java.util.logging.Level,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Log exception/error information via API logging infrastructure.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getClass(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the latest revision of the class with the specified name.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getClass(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the latest revision of the class with the specified ID.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getClass(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the specified revision of the class with the specified ID.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getClasses
member.summary: Returns a collection of the latest revisions of the model classes available in the model.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getAllPages
member.summary: Returns all the Catalog pages in the form of collection of ModelPage objects.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getModelRevID
member.summary: Returns the revision ID of the model.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getAllRoles
member.summary: Returns all roles defined in the model.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getCurrentRoles
member.summary: Returns roles defined for current connection context.
member.returns: collection of roles for current user
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.checkPermissions(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convenience function to check a set of permissions for the current user. Supply multiple permissions by OR'ing together different permissions. If security is not enabled, or if no bits are set in the parameter, the method returns true.
member.returns: returns true if all permissions specified are allowed in all roles associated with current user
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getVersionInfo
member.summary:
Returns XHQ version information associated with the XHQ Model Server.
Since: XHQ 4.1
member.returns: XhqVersionInfo instance with the version information
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getAllUnitsOfMeasure
member.summary:
Returns a map of all units defined in XHQ Units of Measure system.
Since: XHQ 4.5
member.returns: Map of all units of measure, keyed by name.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getUnitsByCategory(System.String)
member.summary:
Obtain a list of units defined in XHQ Units of Measure system, filtered by catagory.
Since: XHQ 4.5
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.convertToUnits(System.Double,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Convert the value from one units to another. If the units are not compatible or undefined, the value Double.NaN is returned as an error.
Since: XHQ 4.5
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getAllUOMCategories
member.summary:
Return a sorted set of all UOM categories. This includes categories that are simply base units if no category name is configured.
Since: XHQ 4.5
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getCommonUOMCategories
member.summary:
Return a sorted set of common UOM categories. This does not include categories that are simply base units.
Since: XHQ 4.5
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.geUOMCategoryMapping
member.summary:
Return a mapping of base units to common UOM categories. This does not include categories that are simply base units.
Since: XHQ 4.5
member.returns: Mapping of base units to UOM categories
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.getCompatibleUnits(System.String)
member.summary:
Return a sorted set of units compatible with those provided.
Since: XHQ 4.5
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.Model.checkConnection
member.summary:
Check the connection to the model server
Since: XHQ 4.5 SP1
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass
member.summary:
The ModelClass class is an abstract class that represents model classes (components) in the XHQ model.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.LATEST_REVISION
member.summary: Special revision number indicating latest version

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.getMembers
member.summary: Returns a collection of members (base type ModelMember).
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.getClassID
member.summary: Returns the ID of the class.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.getClassRevID
member.summary: Returns the revision ID of the class.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.getSuperClassID
member.summary: Returns the ID of the super class.
member.returns: the super class ID or 0, if none

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.getAllowSubclassing
member.summary:
Returns true if subclasses are allowed to be created from this class, otherwise return false.
Since: XHQ 4.5.1 build 24
member.returns: returns true if subclasses are allowed to be created from this class

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.getSuperClassName
member.summary: Returns the name of the super class.
member.returns: the super class name or null, if none

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.getSuperClassPath
member.summary:
Returns comma-separated names of all super classes.
Since: XHQ 4.5.1 build 24
member.returns: comma-separated names of all super classes or null, if none

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.getViews
member.summary: Returns the views for the class.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelClass.getRoles
member.summary: Returns a collection of roles.
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelCommunicationException
member.summary:
The ModelCommunicationException is the exception class for XHQ Model Server client API that indicate that there has been a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelCommunicationException.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new error with null as its detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause().

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelCommunicationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new error with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause().
member.param: the detail message. The detail message is saved for later retrieval by the getMessage() method.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelCommunicationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary:
Constructs a new error with the specified detail message and cause.
Note that the detail message associated with cause is not automatically incorporated in this error's detail message.
member.param: the detail message (which is saved for later retrieval by the getMessage() method).
the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the getCause() method). (A null value is permitted, and indicates that the cause is nonexistent or unknown.)

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelCommunicationException.#ctor(System.Exception)
member.summary: Constructs a new error with the specified cause and a detail message of null or cause.toString() (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).
member.param: the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the getCause() method). (A null value is permitted, and indicates that the cause is nonexistent or unknown.)

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelItem
member.summary:
The ModelItem class is an abstract class that provides common baisic properties for many concrete classes in this package.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelItem.getModel
member.summary: Obtain the XHQ Model Server interface whence this item came.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelItem.getName
member.summary: Returns the name of the item

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelItem.getDescription
member.summary: Returns the description of the item

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember
member.summary:
The ModelMember class is an abstract class that represents members of model classes. Concrete extensions of this class provide meaningful access to the XHQ model class hierarchy.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.NO_MEMBER_ID
member.summary: A member ID representing an object itself.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.getParentClass
member.summary: Returns the class
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.getMID
member.summary: Returns the ID of the member.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.getClassID
member.summary: Returns the ID of the class.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.getContentsExposed
member.summary:
Returns the indication that the contents of this member should be exposed as instances. The meaning of content depnends on the actual member type.
Since: XHQ 4.5 SP1
member.returns: true when content of member is exposed

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.getContentsExposureNodeName
member.summary:
Returns name to use for the node when contents are exposed. If the node is not traversable and the contents are exposed, the contents are exposed under the member's parent.
Since: XHQ 4.5 SP1
member.returns: name when exposing contents and the member node is traverable, null otherwise

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.getClassRevID
member.summary: Returns the revision ID of the class.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.isHidden
member.summary: Returns the indication that member is hidden or not. The hidden flag is used to control visibility of the member when displayed in unser interface applications.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.isRestricted
member.summary: Returns the indication that member is restricted for modification (in the component editor). If a member is marked as restricted, then it cannot be modified by editing tools like the component editor.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.getDefiningClassID
member.summary:
Returns the ID of the class that defines the member.
Since: XHQ 4.5 SP1

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMember.getDefiningClassRevID
member.summary:
Returns the revision ID of the class that defines the member.
Since: XHQ 4.5 SP1

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberClass
member.summary:
The ModelMemberClass class represents a member that is a type of different class in the XHQ Model server.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberClass.getMembers
member.summary: Returns a sorted set of this members's members (base type ModelMember).
member.returns: Collection of this reference class's members
member.exception: if there is a problem communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberClass.getRefClassID
member.summary: Returns class ID of the class to which this member refers.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberClass.getRefClassRevID
member.summary: Returns class revision ID of the class to which this member refers.

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberCollection
member.summary:
The ModelMemberCollection class represents a member collection of another class in the XHQ Model.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberCollection.getMembers
member.summary: Returns a sorted set of this collections's members (base type ModelMember).
member.exception: if a problem is encountered communicating with the XHQ Model Server.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberCollection.getRefClassID
member.summary: Returns class ID of the collection represented by the member

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberCollection.getRefClassRevID
member.summary: Returns class revision ID of the object to which this member refers.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberCollection.getContentsExposed
member.summary:
Returns the indication that the contents of this member should be exposed as instances. The meaning of content depnends on the actual member type.
Since: XHQ 4.5 SP1
member.returns: true when content of member is exposed

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberCollection.getContentsExposureNodeName
member.summary:
Returns name to use for the node when contents are exposed. If the node is not traversable and the contents are exposed, the contents are exposed under the member's parent.
Since: XHQ 4.5 SP1
member.returns: name when exposing contents and the member node is traverable, null otherwise

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberGroup
member.summary:
The ModelMemberGroup class represents a member that is a used for grouping other instances.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberGroup.getRefClassID
member.summary: Returns class ID of the class if the group member has a class type
member.returns: class ID or 0, if none defined

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberGroup.getRefClassRevID
member.summary: Returns class revision ID of the class, if getRefClassID is non-zero.

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberPrimitive
member.summary:
The ModelMemberPrimitive class represents a primitive member of a class in the XHQ Model.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.summary: Data values of float type.

member.summary: Data values of double type.

member.summary: Data values of DateTime type.

member.summary: Data values of TimeInterval type.

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberPrimitive.TYPE_STRING
member.summary: Data values of String type.

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberPrimitive.TYPE_TEXT
member.summary: Data values of String type.

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberPrimitive.ATTR_NONE
member.summary: Member has no attribute setting.

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberPrimitive.ATTR_VALUE
member.summary: Member is a value attribute.

member.summary: Member is a units attribute.

member.summary: Member is a description attribute.

member.summary: Member is a tag configuration attribute.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberPrimitive.getDataType
member.summary: Returns the data type of the primitive member. Types are any of the TYPE_* constants.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelMemberPrimitive.getAttribute
member.summary: Returns the attribute setting of the primitive member. Types are any of the ATTR_* constants.

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelPage
member.summary:
The ModelPage class is an abstract class that represents model pages in the XHQ model.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.summary: Returns the ID of the page.

member.summary: Indicates whether the ModelClass given is on the page.

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelRole

member.summary: Indicates whether group is locally defined or system-wide.

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM
member.summary: Unit of Measure object describing a unit of measure defined in the XHQ Model Server. This can be used to convert values from one unit of measure to another, compatible unit of measure.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.compareTo(com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM)
member.summary: Compares units of measure for per Comparable interface specification.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares units of measure for equivalency.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.getName
member.summary: The name of the unit of measure - this is case sensitive.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.getBaseUnits
member.summary: The base units that this unit of measure uses to convert to other compatible units of measure.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.getCategory
member.summary: The category of the unit of measure. If there is no category, the base unit of measure is used.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.getDefinition
member.summary: The definition of the unit of measure - informational only.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.getSortOrder
member.summary: Alternate sort order for special ordering such as in pick-lists. The convention is to only assign ordered values to important units of measure and 0 to those which are not commonly used.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.getFactorA
member.summary: The A factor in the conversion equation.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.getFactorB
member.summary: The B factor in the conversion equation.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.getFactorC
member.summary: The C factor in the conversion equation.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.getFactorD
member.summary: The D factor in the conversion equation.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.isBaseUnits
member.summary: Returns true if this unit of measure is a base unit of measure.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.normalize(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the given value to the base unit of measure.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelUOM.denormalize(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the given value from the base unit of measure.

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView
member.summary:
The ModelView class represents views defined for classes in the XHQ model.
Since: XHQ 4.0

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.PROPERTY_FLOW
member.summary: View can be used in a flow of collection items

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.PROPERTY_NAVIGABLE
member.summary: View can be navigated by clicking on it

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.PROPERTY_DRILLABLE
member.summary: Clicking on this view leads to a another detailed view

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.PROPERTY_DEFAULT
member.summary: This is the default view that is displayed for instances of the class

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.PROPERTY_POP_UP
member.summary: View is displayed in a new "pop up" window (does not replace current view)

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.PROPERTY_TILE
member.summary: This is a "Tile View" for use in a composert-type view.

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.PROPERTY_REUSABLE
member.summary: This is a reusable (component-based) Visual Tile Composer view.

member.name: P:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.PROPERTY_PUBLISHED
member.summary: This is a published Visual Tile Composer view.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.getViewID
member.summary: Returns the ID of the view.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.getClassID
member.summary: Returns the ID of the class.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.getViewRevID
member.summary: Returns the revision ID of the view.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.clientapi.ModelView.getProperties
member.summary: Returns the encoded property mask.

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.ModelError
member.summary: The ModelError is the base error class for XHQ Model Server packages.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.ModelError.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new error with null as its detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause().

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.ModelError.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new error with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause().
member.param: the detail message. The detail message is saved for later retrieval by the getMessage() method.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.ModelError.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary:
Constructs a new error with the specified detail message and cause.
Note that the detail message associated with cause is not automatically incorporated in this error's detail message.
member.param: the detail message (which is saved for later retrieval by the getMessage() method).
the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the getCause() method). (A null value is permitted, and indicates that the cause is nonexistent or unknown.)

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.ModelError.#ctor(System.Exception)
member.summary: Constructs a new error with the specified cause and a detail message of null or cause.toString() (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).
member.param: the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the getCause() method). (A null value is permitted, and indicates that the cause is nonexistent or unknown.)

member.name: T:com.indx.xhq.model.ModelException
member.summary: The ModelException is the base error class for XHQ Model Server packages.

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.ModelException.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new error with null as its detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause().

member.summary: Constructs a new error with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause().
member.param: the detail message. The detail message is saved for later retrieval by the getMessage() method.

Constructs a new error with the specified detail message and cause.
Note that the detail message associated with cause is not automatically incorporated in this error's detail message.
member.param: the detail message (which is saved for later retrieval by the getMessage() method).
the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the getCause() method). (A null value is permitted, and indicates that the cause is nonexistent or unknown.)

member.name: M:com.indx.xhq.model.ModelException.#ctor(System.Exception)
member.summary: Constructs a new error with the specified cause and a detail message of null or cause.toString() (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).
member.param: the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the getCause() method). (A null value is permitted, and indicates that the cause is nonexistent or unknown.)
